item.title: Leli add a quote by Abdurahman Faiz
item.description: "Bunda, engkau adalah puisi abadi yang tak pernah kutemukan dalam buku..." -- Abdurahman Faiz

item.title: Leli add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Leli add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Leli add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Leli add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Leli add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I don't want to go to heaven. None of my friends are there." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Leli add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "For instance, on the planet Earth, man had always assumed that he was more intelligent than dolphins because he had achieved so much&mdash;the wheel, New York, wars and so on&mdash;whilst all the dolphins had ever done was muck about in the water having a good time. But conversely, the dolphins had always believed that they were far more intelligent than man&mdash;for precisely the same reasons." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Leli add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I wish it need not have happened in my time," said Frodo. "So do I," said Gandalf, "and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Leli add a quote by Abdurahman Faiz
item.description: "Aku selalu bermimpi matahari melahirkan para guru dan guru melahirkan para matahari..." -- Abdurahman Faiz

item.title: Leli add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "First we thought the PC was a calculator. Then we found out how to turn numbers into letters with ASCII — and we thought it was a typewriter. Then we discovered graphics, and we thought it was a television. With the World Wide Web, we've realized it's a brochure." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Leli add a quote by Michael Crichton
item.description: "Do you know what we call opinion in the absence of evidence? We call it prejudice." -- Michael Crichton

item.title: Leli add a quote by David Byrne
item.description: "Sometimes it's a form of love just to talk to somebody that you have nothing in common with and still be fascinated by their presence." -- David Byrne

item.title: Leli add a quote by W.C. Fields
item.description: "I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food." -- W.C. Fields

item.title: Leli add a quote by Charles de Gaulle
item.description: "How can you govern a country which has 246 varieties of cheese?" -- Charles de Gaulle

item.title: Leli add a quote by Abdurahman Faiz
item.description: "Merah putih masih merayap gelisah mencari Hatta dalam jiwa dua ratus juta kita." -- Abdurahman Faiz

item.title: Leli add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "You have to write the book that wants to be written. And if the book will be too difficult for grown-ups, then you write it for children." -- Madeleine L'Engle

item.title: Leli add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "Fiction was invented the day Jonah arrived home and told his wife that he was three days late because he had been swallowed by a whale.." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Leli add a quote by George Lucas
item.description: "Rejoice for those around you who transform into the Force. Mourn them, do not. Miss them, do not. Attachment leads to jealousy. The shadow of greed, that is. Train yourself to let go of everything you fear to lose" -- George Lucas

item.title: Leli add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Those who believe in telekinetics, raise my hand." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Leli add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "My Life is My Message" -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Leli add a quote by Steve Wozniak
item.description: "Never trust a computer you can't throw out a window" -- Steve Wozniak

item.title: Leli add a quote by Homer
item.description: "I didn't lie! I just created fiction with my mouth!" -- Homer

item.title: Leli add a quote by Leonardo da Vinci
item.description: "Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication." -- Leonardo da Vinci

item.title: Leli add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "The highest result of education is tolerance" -- Helen Keller

item.title: Leli add a quote by Rabindranath Tagore
item.description: "zaman modern telah membawa geografi bumi ke dekat kita,tetapi membuat kita kesulitan untuk saling berhubungan dengan manusia" -- Rabindranath Tagore

item.title: Leli add a quote by Walter M. Miller Jr.
item.description: "You don’t <i>have</i> a soul, Doctor. You <i>are</i> a soul. You <i>have</i> a body, temporarily." -- Walter M. Miller Jr.

item.title: Leli add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I'm not afraid of death; I just don't want to be there when it happens." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Leli add a quote by Sam Ewing
item.description: "When you feel neglected, think of the female salmon, who lays 3,000,000 eggs but no one remembers her on Mother's Day" -- Sam Ewing

item.title: Leli add a quote by Harold Bloom
item.description: "Reading well is one of the great pleasures that solitude can afford you." -- Harold Bloom

item.title: Leli add a quote by Pangeran Dipanagara
item.description:
"lamun tiyang nyepeng pedhang dipunsambi nyepeng arta kadospundi punapa tan kapiran
----
bila orang yang memegang pedang juga diserahi untuk memegang uang, bagaimana jadinya? tidakkah urusan akan telantar?" -- Pangeran Dipanagara
